section.p: Describes the nature of the financial arrangement or contract between a healthcare provider and a health plan. Financial Arrangements are commonly based on Fee Schedules, Capitation arrangements, or some kind of combination of the two.

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] contractId with data type Id
Contains exactly one [1..1] healthPlan, where its type is Health Plan
Contains exactly one [1..1] billableAct, where its type is Billable Service
Contains exactly one [1..1] contractId with data type Id
Contains exactly one [1..1] healthPlan, where its type is Health Plan
Contains exactly one [1..1] billableAct, where its type is Billable Service
